roleset.name: want, desire
roleset.note: WANT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'want' based on survey of initial sentences from big corpusand comparison to 'plan'VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls appoint-29.1, want-32.1-1-1 (from want.01-v)

roles.note: Passivized and Passivized with extraction are predicted, but unlikely:For the dam to be built is wanted by Czechoslovakia.The dam is wanted to be built by Czechoslovakia.(note the the latter is ambiguous--is Cz the wanter or the builder?) (from want.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: I want a flight from Ontario to Chicago
example.arg: a flight from Ontario to Chicago

example.name: arg1 as infinitive
example.text: I actually want *trace* to go from Ontario to Chicago
example.arg: *trace* to go from Ontario to Chicago

example.name: arg1 as infinitival sentence
example.text: Czechoslovakia still wants the dam to be built.

example.name: passive with extraction
example.text: he-1 was wanted *trace*-1 as a suspect in a double murder
example.arg: *trace*-1 as a suspect in a double murder
